name: Bounded Oscillatory ARP Redshift Bypass Law
differentialLatex: \dot z = z_h\gamma e^{-\gamma t}\left(1-\epsilon\cos(\omega t+\phi)\right) + z_h\left(1-e^{-\gamma t}\right)\epsilon\omega\sin(\omega t+\phi)
description: A bounded oscillatory extension of ARP redshift relaxation. It preserves nonnegative trajectories while allowing controlled evasive wobble via phase modulation.
assumptions: Single effective horizon scale z_h over the interval.
Relaxation timescale gamma^{-1} and modulation timescale omega^{-1} are separable.
Bounded modulation amplitude 0<=epsilon<1 enforces nonnegative trajectory.
